relation: Great for these types of students

Lots of campus police to watch over you from the parking lot in the doors to the classrooms and back out the school. I take night classes and i always feel well protected walking to my car at night even as a young female.
All students any age. I started attending at 16 while still in high school, the state even covers some tuition
Great teachers, Great school, and affordable
there are so many clubs to join i have trouble choosing between them all. Lots of activities even outside of class.
great selection of food, a good mix of healthy and junk food.
Talk to an adviser in your specific area of study to be sure to get your exact classes needed. If transferring to four year school talk to that school to know there transfer requirements.
pikes peak is an amazing school that gives everyone the chance to get a college education at anytime in life. Its a chance to go to school without paying more expensive tuition.
pageTitle: Pikes Peak Community College Reviews: Student Reviews and Ratings | Cappex
TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {358235=Well I haven't attended the school yet, I've only signed up for my classes I'll be attending in the spring of 2015. So it's difficult for me to speak upon the academic rigor at this moment., 367302=© 2015, Cappex.com, LLC, 253549=I attend PPCC from 2012-2013 but, unfortunately I had to move out of state. I love PPCC because of the degree plan I had set up and the staff. The staff members there try to work with you and help as much as they can, also the class sizes are perfect not to big and not to small., 268265=Will start classes August 2013 but so far has been great, 1742=The tuition of Pikes Peak is a decent price and financial aid really helps too. For my last semester which was 14 credit hours I paid 1600 plus books.}

textAfterTable: Campus Safety there is a good feeling of safety and protection at pikes peak. Clubs and Activities there are limited numbers of clubs and activities at pikes peak. Great for these types of students students who want one-on-one help from the teacher and great interaction between fellow students. Bang for the buck with in-state tuition at less than $3500, earning a two year degree cannot be cheaper. What to do for fun find a study group. this is a great way to meet new people and get help outside the classroom. Food and Dining the cafeteria is good, healthy food at a good price. Dorm Life pikes peak does not have dorms. Academic Rigor since this is a community college, this is not the most competitive learning environment. it is college, so not a place to be lazy either. Tips for prospective students
